title: Charch in for PA #92Noon!
description: You'll hear a lot of football early on from Charch as Mat Harrison joins him in studio, then a Bears deep dive from Chicago radio host Matt Spiegel(Score670), and the final hour is all baseball with Aaron Gleeman in studio!
